alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Knox (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 11:21AM EST until December 25 at 11:30AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River at Seymour. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... White River at Edwardsport, Elliston, Petersburg, and Hazleton. .Rainfall of 1 to 2 inches from Friday night into Saturday caused minor flooding to develop along portions of the White River and the East Fork White River in southern parts of central Indiana. Flooding may persist into Christmas Eve for portions of the White River. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Hazleton. * WHEN...From this evening to late Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Floodwaters cover much low ground in agricultural season. Low lying oil fields...Pottsville Road and possibly a few other low rural roads flood. High water isolates Pottstown, a river cabin community. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 18.0 feet early Wednesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Friday evening. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind.
